Commentary.ab: Y3.4e aṣ̌aiiąmca] sec, Redard; Geldner aš́iiąmca; Kellens em. ⁺aṣ̌aiiąmca.
Y3.4e ratufritīmca] damn., expected ratufritīm (vid. Kellens, 1996, p. 57). ratufritīm 100 a.c. (ratufritīmca), 677.

Y3.4e hauuahe] cod 510 hauuahē a.c. (hauuahēca), 4010 hauuahē, 4025, 4040 a.c. (hauuaheca). Geldner, Kellens, Redard hauuaheca. Kellens, 1996, p. 57: "xšnumaine n'est jamais répété sans que le soit āiiese yešti ou aṣ̌aiia daδąmi, c'est lui qui doit être considéré comme intrus", but cf. Y3.1 xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ ... xšnūmaine sraōšahe .... Cf. Y7.5.

Parallels.ab: gāϑanąmca sraōϑrəm āiiese yešti ~ Y22.4, Y22.24, Y22.25, Y24.3, Y24.8, Y25.3, VrS87.11 gāϑanąmca sraōϑrəm [...] ratufritīm
huuarštā° mąϑrā̊ = VrS62.5, VrS62.6, VrS93.8, VrS93.9
imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca = VrS78.31, VrS78.32, VrS81.18, VrS82.19, VrS82.20, VrS82.39, VrS83.2. In the aforementioned equivalents in YR raϑβąmca omitted
aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca ~ Y16.2 aŋhuiiaōš aṣ̌acinaŋhō. maińiiauuanąm gaēϑiianąm ~ Y1.20 maińiiaōibiiascā gaēϑiiaēibiiascā; ~ Y19.20, Y20.4 maińiiaōmca gaēϑīmca
raϑβąmca ratufritīmca ~ VrS11.35, VrS27.6 raϑβaēca ratufritaiiaēca.
hauuahe urunō = Y1.19, Y7.5, Y22.29, Y24.30; ~ Y66.24 Yt8.15, Yt8.17, Yt8.19 hauuaheca urunō; ~ Y71.11 hauuāi urune; ~ Y69.29, Y71.19, VS13.9, Yt6.4 haōm uruuānəm
